articles.title: Meta pauses new users from joining analytics tool CrowdTangle
articles.description: Meta, which disbanded the CrowdTangle team last year, has been under pressure to provide greater transparency into its platforms.
articles.content: Facebook's parent company Meta Platforms Inc has paused new users from joining its social media tracking tool CrowdTangle due to staffing constraints.
